resources.name: en
resources.title: English
resources.string_add: Block messages with toxic content. This option can not work without Antispam module.
This message can not be PUBLISHED because doesn't meet our community standards. Please use kinder, gentler words if you want to try again.
Jot Server's JWT token secret word. You should add the same word in config.json of your Jot Server ( leave it empty if don't want to use JWT tokens for Jot Server)
Use these criteria for messages filtration
Use from now time format in Talk's history
Don't show description in search profiles popup
Allow to create Talks only with friends
